_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_: Enables interactive selection of a date range by providing two date fields to define 'From' and 'To' values.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_MOD: Serves to store and manage the selected date interval values within the component.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_SEL: Handles additional actions or side effects to be triggered upon date selection.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_DIS: Controls whether user interactions with the datepicker range are possible or not.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_OPT: Contains configurable parameters and attributes to modify the behavior and appearance of the datepicker.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_ID_: Provides a means to customize the ID attributes of the component elements in case multiple instances exist on the same page.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_PROP_IS_: Flag to control visual error states or enable specific logic during error states within the component.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_EMIT_INP: Informs the parent element about changes in input values and transmits the current values of the datepicker range.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_EMIT_CHA: Notifies the parent element when a final date selection has been made and sends the new data for further use or processing.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_DESCRIPTION_EMIT_FOC: Informs the parent element when the datepicker is focused, which can be useful for activating special UI states or executing certain logics.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_MODEL_SELECTED_DISAB: Integrates the 'model' and 'selected' properties and manages the disabled status.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_OPTIONS_CLASS_NAME_D: Utilizes the 'className' property for custom styles.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_OPTIONS_DATA_ERRORS_: Processes data and errors while incorporating additional static information.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_OPTIONS_EVENTS_DESCR: Manages user events such as focus and input changes.
_A_DATEPICKER_RANGE_OPTIONS_ID_PREFIX_IS: Controls error display and assigns IDs using 'idPrefix'.
